actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A  bill to provide for the establishment of the Bandon Marsh National Wildlife Refuge, Coos County, State of Oregon.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Bandon Marsh National Wildlife Refuge in Oregon. Permits the Secretary to utilize such additional statutory authority as may be available for: (1) the development of outdoor recreation opportunities compatible with the wildlife resources of the refuge; and (2) interpretive education. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A  bill to provide for the establishment of the Bandon Marsh National Wildlife Refuge, Coos County, State of Oregon.
